steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"fs4fq","text":"Add  Lysis master mix to 2ml eppendorf tube","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":3,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"76sc2","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4ng5i","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"c2llg","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"867","error":false,"guid":"F740A4A0C9F611EDA819F3D5E15C6E45","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"c1eu2","text":"In 4°C fridge","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":6,"offset":19,"style":"bold"},{"length":6,"offset":41,"style":"bold"},{"length":6,"offset":66,"style":"bold"}],"key":"1ojhv","text":"Lysis master mix:  225 µL of TE buffer + 375 µL of lysis buffer + 267 µL of 10M ammonium acetate","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"d17ov","text":"Put 2ml eppendorf tube in mixmill for sample crush, at this condition: 30 rpm/s, for 4mins   ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":91,"length":1}],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":240,"guid":"C558C816DD8411ECB8730A58A9FEAC02","id":"82986","label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ddgn5","text":"Put 2ml eppendorf tube in centrifuge for centrifugation, at this condition:  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":75,"length":1}],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"centrifuge":"17.0","duration":180,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"CEA088CEDD8411ECB8730A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"25","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":34}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3eej8","text":"Add   of isopropanol to the 1st well of 96 well plate","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":9,"length":11}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"ekqtc","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7hbkc","text":"   ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":1,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"350","error":false,"guid":"E0CAD9F6DD8411ECB8730A58A9FEAC02","id":"93767","label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"9B44D270C9F611EDA819F3D5E15C6E45","height":398,"id":354260,"is_video":false,"legend":"","mime":"image/jpeg","nestedSelector":null,"original_name":"image10.jpg","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/k38ybhxvf.jpg","shadow":false,"source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/k38wbhxvf.jpg","webp_placeholder":"https://s3.amazonaws.com/protocols-files/files/k38xbhxvf.webp","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/k38vbhxvf.webp","width":550}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5gqfa","text":"Add   of magnetic beads (10 mg/ml) to the 1st well of 96 deep well plate ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":9,"length":14}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"2vrdk","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7u8te","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"d0k0q","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5j0ho","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"125","error":false,"guid":"F6DF4BAFDD8411ECB8730A58A9FEAC02","id":"93768","label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"7bboj","text":"Vortex the bottle and pipetting before using magnetic beads; re-do vortex after adding to 3 samples to prevent set down of magnetic beads","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4u2a9","text":"Add   of the sample (lysate) from the 2ml centrifuged tube to the 1st well of 96 deep well plate ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":13,"length":16}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"5vcpd","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"5ae5o","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"200-300","error":false,"guid":"0FA78DAEDD8511ECB8730A58A9FEAC02","id":"93769","label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":25,"offset":10,"style":"bold"}],"key":"34il4","text":"Pipetting as much lysate as you can, as long as it's free of any cell debris (no solids in your tip) ","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"39vis","text":"","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":11,"offset":0,"style":"bold"}],"key":"5iotb","text":"ADD at LAST","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}
